topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556133196368725679000200#post_556133196368725679000200
Let me tell ya how to solve those lines. 
Take a sketchbook. Put 2 dots at a distance of your chocie on equal levels. Try to quickly make a line from one dot to the other.

Repeat. Expand the distance when you feel comfortable with one.

For circles draw a big circle in the sketchbook, then try to do another next to it and have the sides touch. Also make circles in side the circles.

Its good for line pressure and pen control.

Do it a lot, or when you watch a video or something if you need to.
